definition: foot-binding/long strip of cloth used for foot-binding
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: The custom of binding women's feet died out.
sentences.chinese: 妇女裹脚的习俗早已不存在了。

sentences.english: Resurrecting complex characters is like asking women to restart binding their feet.
sentences.chinese: 恢复繁体字就跟要求女人恢复裹脚一样。

sentences.english: The pain that the woman must have endured at as early as three years old must have been unbeatable.
sentences.chinese: 女性在三岁时所要忍受的裹脚之痛一定是无以言表的。

sentences.english: Half of his last blanket had gone into foot- wrappings .
sentences.chinese: 剩下的毯子已经有一半做了裹脚布。

sentences.english: And I was the first in my family among the girls not to have bound feet.
sentences.chinese: 我在我们姐妹中是第一个不裹脚的女孩子。

sentences.english: The big automakers are bogged down by excessive management and staff.
sentences.chinese: 大的汽车生产商由于管理繁琐，人员庞杂而裹脚不前。

sentences.english: Half of his last blanket had gone into foot-wrappings.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的那条毯子的一半都已经做了裹脚布。

sentences.english: Velvety soft terry linings wrap the foot in moisture-wicking comfort.
sentences.chinese: 天鹅绒般柔软的毛圈衬裹脚排汗舒适。

definition: Confucian moral injunctions for women, namely: obey in turn three men father, husband and son, plus the four virtues of morality 德, physical charm 容, propriety in speech 言 and efficiency in needlework 功
a woman's virtue is to have no talent (idiom)
pinyin: nu:3 zi3 wu2 cai2 bian4 shi4 de2

definition: to regard men as superior to women (idiom)
forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
